description.value:
Your attack leaves a foe reeling, and lets you channel psionic power to fling yourself or the enemy across the battlefield.

At-Will âœ¦ Augmentable, Psionic, Weapon

Standard Action • Melee weapon

Target: One creature

Attack: Constitution vs. AC

Hit: 1[W] + Constitution modifier damage. Until the end of your next turn, the target grants combat advantage while within 5 squares of you.

Augment 2

Keyword: Teleportation

Hit: As above, and when an ally hits the target, you can teleport 3 squares as a free action.

Augment 6

Keyword: Teleportation

Hit: 2[W] + Constitution modifier damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn. Also until the end of your next turn, when you or any ally hits the target, you can teleport yourself or the target 3 squares as a free action.

Published in Psionic Power, page(s) 46.

hit.detail: 1[W] + Constitution modifier damage. Until the end of your next turn, the target grants combat advantage while within 5 squares of you.

system.special:
Keyword: Teleportation
Hit 2: As above, and when an ally hits the target, you can teleport 3 squares as a free action.
Keyword 2: Teleportation
Hit 3: 2[W] + Constitution modifier damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn. Also until the end of your next turn, when you or any ally hits the target, you can teleport yourself or the target 3 squares as a free action.
